CUSTOMER.PAYMENT_METHODS_DESCRIPTION: Create a payment method, or update an existing one, before subscribing to any paid features. If you are updating an existing payment method, make sure you fill in the credit card details. Once you've updated your credit card details, your new card will be charged during your next billing cycle.
CUSTOMER.CREATE_HELP: Enter your billing information and your payment details.
CUSTOMER.BILLING_NAME_HELP: Enter the name exactly like it is on the card. E.g. John Smith
CUSTOMER.BILLING_EMAIL_HELP: Enter the email you want to receive notifications when we charge your card. E.g. john@smith.com
CUSTOMER.BILLING_ADDRESS_1_HELP: Enter your billing address. E.g. 11 At home.
CUSTOMER.BILLING_ADDRESS_2_HELP: If you have a second line for your billing address enter it here. E.g. Apt 4F.
CUSTOMER.BILLING_ADDRESS_CITY_HELP: Enter your billing city. E.g. New York City.
CUSTOMER.BILLING_ADDRESS_COUNTRY_HELP: Select your country from the dropdown.
